reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was very well located within District 1 and within walking distance of all things to do there.
reviews.title: Excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a 4 star hotel by Vietnam standards which as we realised is 3 star by world standards. We stayed there for 4 nights. The decor is quite cheap. One night we had mud coming through our taps when we went to shower. Once there was no hot water. We also thought the breakfast was not great quality - sour tasting fruits!
reviews.title: Great Location, Good Value

reviews.text: Having said the above, the great location made the stay acceptable. We had wanted to stay at Majestic but it was all booked out so settled for this hotel. As it turned out KimDo was much better located than the Majestic.
reviews.title: Good, but not amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 3 nights late July. Great location
reviews.title: Miserable stay

reviews.text: Paid $78US for a deluxe room with breakfast through a VN internet travel site which I thought was good value. Staff are friendly and helpful and breakfast plentiful. Only criticism dont book for the pool which is small and tucked away on a lower floor would suggest they would be better not advertising it.
reviews.title: Kimdo - Excellent price, location and breakfast.

likes.liked: — Clean rooms, and great breakfast bufffet.
